sources.title: Time Lock
sources.description: Title: Time Lock Summary: A boy is accidentally locked in a bank vault. With less than ten hours of oxygen left in the vault, it becomes a race to save the boy. Directed by: Gerald Thomas Actors: Robert Beatty, Lee Patterson, Betty McDowall Production Company: Romulus Films Release Date: 5 September 1957 (Denmark) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A boy is accidentally locked in a bank vault. With less than ten hours of oxygen left in the vault, it becomes a race to save the boy.

metadata.Plot: A boy is accidentally locked in a bank vault. With less than ten hours of oxygen left in the vault, it becomes a race to save the boy.
